title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2440/93 of 2 September 1993 amending Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1318/93 on detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 2067/92 on measures to promote and market quality beef and veal
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2440/93 of 2 September 1993 amending Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1318/93 on detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 2067/92 on measures to promote and market quality beef and veal
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following text is added to the second paragraph of Article 7 (1):
'Advances for the year 1993 may, however, cover 50 % of this maximum amount, on condition that they are paid before 10 October 1993'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 September 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
